history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: pluspf_inv1_eq. hauto lq: on use: minuspf_is_minusP, minusP_inv1. qsimpl time: 1 use: pluspf_inv1_eq,pX,pluspf_inv2_eq. qsimpl time: 1 use: pluspf_inv1_eq,pluspf_inv3b_eq,pX,pluspf_inv2_eq.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- pluspf_inv1_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q).
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "pluspf ?M1959 ?M1961 ?M1962 ?M1965 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- pluspf_inv2_eq with (a := b) (b := a) (p := pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (q := p).
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "pluspf ?M5592 ?M5594 ?M5595 ?M5598 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.tactic: apply pluspf_inv3b_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (minuspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)) = minuspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)

p0_pluspf_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pO A n) p) p
pluspf_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p q : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec q p)

```coq
intros a b p q H.
rewrite <- pluspf_inv1_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q).
rewrite <- pluspf_inv2_eq with (a := b) (b := a) (p := pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (q := p).
apply pluspf_inv3b_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q).
auto.
Qed.

original: intros a b p q H. rewrite <- pluspf_inv1_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q). rewrite <- pluspf_inv2_eq with (a := b) (b := a) (p := pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (q := p). apply pluspf_inv3b_eq with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := q). auto.
